channel.title: Radarr on 夜云泊
channel.description: Recent content in Radarr on 夜云泊

item.title: Docker 部署 Radarr 刮削电影
item.description: docker-compose.yml version: "3.7" services: radarr: container_name: radarr image: dockerproxy.com/linuxserver/radarr:latest ports: - "7878:7878" environment: - PUID=1000 - PGID=1000 - UMASK=002 - TZ=Asia/Shanghai volumes: - /root/sharedfolder/appdata/radarr:/config - /root/sharedfolder/media:/movies - /root/sharedfolder/downloads/qbittorrent:/downloads 配置中文界面： 导入视频：
